attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we need to save our town, from drugs and scroungers and also the increasing number of sexual assaults, rapists , perverts murders etc, come on brid folk get a grip, also the brid folk need a hopital , so come on .

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
